gang,
we all know the NTHK und NBTHK have " different " policy in pinkie
submitted items.

NTHK is more " hang up " on condition, ja ?

Assuming I have a tsuba made by a good maker ( not gimei ) ,
condition is good on the omote side ( where the mei is ) but the ura
side has rust damage ( 1/3 area ).
What's the chance it will pass/get pinkied ?

Milt
